title: Error when importing aggregated offerings
content:
When you run a simulation import or real import of aggregated offerings, an error occurs. The following are examples.

No. Error message
1 Cannot import the Aggregated Offering because the Service Design does not exist: [ProviderId = xxxxxx, RemoteOfferingId = xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx]
2 Cannot import the Aggregated Offering because the Provider does not exist or is not unique:[ProviderName = xxxxxxxxxxxxxx]
3

Cannot import the Aggregated Offering [ProviderId = xxxxx, RemoteOfferingId = xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx]: The request could not be completed. 401:"{"code"."authentication.failed","message"."Authentication failure","detail"."Authentication failure"}"
4

Cannot import the Aggregated Offering [ProviderId = 11675, RemoteOfferingId = d76ad85c-b866-4227-ad49-9b38f8d6949c]: could not execute request to <provider URL>/api/v1/<tenant ID>/design/xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx due to network problem

Cause

See the following table. 

Error  Root cause
1 The service design associated with the offering either doesn't exist in the target tenant or isn't in the published state. 
2 The name of the aggregation provider associated with the offering either doesn't exist in the target tenant or isn't unique in the target tenant. 
3 Incorrect login name or password for the aggregation provider in the target tenant. 
4 Incorrect URL for the aggregation provider in the target tenant. 

Solution

See the following table.

Error Solution
1 Publish and export the service design from the source tenant and then import it to the target tenant. 
2 Create an aggregation provider in the target tenant with the same name as in the source tenant, or update the provider name in both the source and target tenants to make it unique in the target tenant. 
3 Reconfigure the aggregation provider in the target tenant with the correct login name or password. 
4 Reconfigure the aggregation provider in the target tenant with the correct URL: https://itom-dnd-controller-svc:8444/dnd
